org.drip.product.definition

Interface BondProduct

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BondComponent

    public interface BondProduct
    This interface implements the product static data behind bonds of all kinds. Bond static data is captured in a set of 11 container classes – BondTSYParams, BondCouponParams, BondNotionalParams, BondFloaterParams, BondCurrencyParams, BondIdentifierParams, ComponentValuationParams, ComponentRatesValuationParams, ComponentCreditValuationParams, ComponentTerminationEvent, BondFixedPeriodParams, and one EmbeddedOptionSchedule object instance each for the call and the put objects. Each of these parameter sets can be set separately.
